short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser plug-in, it is convenient to use the left and right keys of the keyboard to turn pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This product is a keyboard shortcut that allows users to navigate web pages by pressing the left and right arrow keys. This can be a useful feature for users who prefer to use their keyboard instead of their mouse.

Quick and easy page navigation
Improved accessibility for users who prefer to use their keyboard
Supports multiple pages
Efficient use of network resources
